Ref: CXP015/2022
Closing date: 03 January 2023

To undertake and be responsible for the electrical / mechanical maintenance on sites as may be directed by the Field Services Manager and as planned in the maintenance schedules.

Location: Riverhorse Valley, Durban with assignments to various plants

Main Duties include:

-All mechanical & electrical maintenance and fabrication work is performed to the required quality standards.

-The safe and efficient performance of maintenance and fabrication duties in accordance with prescribed maintenance procedures.

-The correct usage and safeguarding of company assets.

-Appointed as Responsible Person (mechanical & electrical) as required by statutory regulations.

-Be available for 24-hour rotational stand-by duties

-Undertake related assignments and maintenance duties that will be assigned by the Maintenance Engineer

Criteria:

-Certified Trade Test as Millwright

-Hold a wireman’s license.

-At least have five years proven experience as a Millwright artisan

-Medically fit to work on industrial and mining site.

-Valid driver’s license.

-Be prepared to work shifts, do standby duties, callouts, and work overtime as per the role requirements.

-Ability to work at heights and in confined spaces.

-Computer literate

-Grade 12 / N3 / Equivalent NQF Level 4 qualification (Preferred)
